titleStmt.title: Short grounds of catechisme delivered by way of question and answer, with plaine proofes for the answer set downe at large. By William Ward minister of the word at Guysbrough in Cleave land within Yorkshire.
titleStmt.author: Ward, William, d. 1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the printers to the Universitie [T. and J. Buck],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Durham University Library.
